attributes.additional_details: The school is financially struggling to sustain the nursery due to a fall in pupils. The local area is due many new housing developments, so we are hopeful that the intake will increase. The staff have always gone above and beyond to make the children feel safe, secure and most of all happy. Every parent has nothing but praise for this fantastic nursery and we really do not want to lose it!
attributes.background: Our wonderful nursery attached to our primary school is due to be closed down in July 2016. The nursery is a huge part of our school and has always been an amazing starting point for all children starting school. This simply can not close!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local nurseries are usually the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
